::Galaxor/Lavatron::

The shots hit Galaxor square in the chest, but his armor holds, the
gestalt not slowing down. Reaching behind him, he pulls out a large
sword, slashing it at Abominus as he nears him. The two missiles he
had shot earlier turn, heading for his enemy's back.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The kick hit Lavatron, making him stumble back and lose his balance.
He falls on his butt, but fires four lightning bolts while doing so.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> OOC: I'll continue posting with Abominus if the others don't mind.
> ::Abominus/Surgital::
> 
>     Abominus ran sideways and avoided the missiles, then shot 2
blasts at Galaxor.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>     Surgital put front his Explobody arm to block the lightning
bolts, since Explobody was the most durable Bodicon.  The bolts tore
into Surgital's arm, but not badly.  The electricty surged through him
a little with each bolt, but he remained standing.  He couldn't die,
those were his orders, after all.  Surgital threw a roundhouse kick at
Lavatron.
